name: Gesture Caster 2021
description:
Gesturecaster is a puzzle game that takes place in a cave in which the player is given a magic wand that is used to interact with certain elements in the cave to solve puzzles to progress further in the game. 

The game takes place in a dark secret cave; the player is an apprentice wizard, who has been assigned by a master wizard to a trial to fix the energy flow of a cave with an abundance of mushrooms. The apprentice wizard is then teleported into the trial that the master wizard mentioned. With mushrooms aplenty, and a trail of gemstones to follow, the apprentice wizard must find a way out by casting spells that interact with the environment.
